 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוח‎</span> (√ of following; = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סחה‎</span> q. v.). 

 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָחָה‎</span>] **verb** ==scrape== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, and <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>1322</sup>) ***scrape off, clear away***; compare Talmud <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְחוּתָא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְחִיתָא‎</span> ***refuse***, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְחִיתָא‎</span> ***dirt, dung***); — only **Pi\`el** ==scrape clean, scour==, ***Perfect*** 1 singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְסִחֵתִ֫י עֲפָרָהּ מֶּנָּהָ‎</span> [[Ezek.26.4|Ezek 26:4]] ***and I will scrape clean her dust from her***.
